name: Nova Mare
description:
Visit the underwater research facility of Nova Mare and find the creature that legend speaks of

This is an entry for the Cosy GMC Jam 39 by me and TheSnidr
Blobfish and other creature models and water depth shader by Snidr

The download contains the version that was submitted as the entry for the jam

The screenshots show a couple of additions in the post-jam version that is being worked on

Controls
  • WASD/ZQSD: move
  • Ctrl: duck
  • Shift: run
  • Left mouse button: shoot (not implemented properly in the jam version)
Music

This is a work in progress. Feel free to check out the current tracks here.

WiseBart · Nova Mare WIP
